title: Did Lindsey Graham Meet a Proud Boys Organizer Before Capitol Attack?
subtitle: After the Jan. 6 assault on the Capitol, social media users highlighted a photograph of Graham with Joe Biggs, who reportedly helped plan the right-wing group's activities on the day of the riots.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: U.S. Sen. Lindsey Graham had dinner with Joe Biggs, a prominent figure in the right-wing Proud Boys group, before Biggs helped plan the January 2021 attack on the U.S. Capitol.
